OVHcloud.description: OVHcloud is a global, cloud provider delivering hosted private cloud, public cloud, and dedicated server solutions.

OWL Carousel.description: OWL Carousel is an enabled jQuery plugin that lets you create responsive carousel sliders.

OXID eShop.description: OXID eShop is a free, open source ecommerce solution built using object oriented programming and PHP.

OXID eShop Community Edition.description: OXID eShop Community Edition is a free, open source ecommerce solution built using object oriented programming and PHP.

OXID eShop Enterprise Edition.description: OXID eShop Enterprise Edition is a B2B or B2C ecommerce solution built using object oriented programming and PHP.

OXID eShop Professional Edition.description: OXID eShop Professional Edition is an e-ommerce platform for both small start-up companies and experience online retailers with a wide range of functions, software maintenance and support.

Obsidian Incentivize.description: Obsidian Incentivize is designed to increase your average order size through in-cart upsells, cross sells and personalised product recommendations.

Obsidian Publish.description: Obsidian Publish is an official, paid plugin for Obsidian that allows users to post selected notes to a directory on the publish.obsidian.md domain.

Obviyo.description: Obviyo is an ecommerce intelligence platform helping merchants personalise and optimise shopping experience.

Occasion.description: Occasion is an online booking system.

OceanWP.description: OceanWP is a fast-loading WordPress theme that has great support for third-party plugins and drag-and-drop page builders.

Ochanoko.description: Ochanoko is a ecommerce online shopping cart solutions, ecommerce web site hosting.

Oct8ne.description: Oct8ne is a visual customer service software.

Octane AI.description: Octane AI provides an all-in-one platform for engaging quizzes, data collection, and personalised Facebook Messenger and SMS automation.

October CMS.description: October is a free, open-source, self-hosted CMS platform based on the Laravel PHP Framework.

Octopress.description: Octopress is a static blogging framework.

Ocuco FitMix.description: Ocuco is now offering its customers FittingBox's FitMix, a virtual frame try-on tool.

Odoo.description: Odoo is business management software which includes CRM, ecommerce, billing, accounting, manufacturing, warehouse, project management, and inventory management.

Oh Dear.description: The all-in-one monitoring tool for your entire website. Oh Dear monitors uptime, SSL certificates, broken links, scheduled tasks, application health, DNS, domain expiry and more.

Okendo.description: Okendo is a customer marketing platform with product ratings and reviews, customer photos and videos to help personalise experiences.

Okta.description: Okta is a platform in the Identity-as-a-Service (IDaaS) category. Okta features include Provisioning, Single Sign-On (SSO), Active Directory (AD) and LDAP integration, the centralized de-provisioning of users, multi-factor authentication (MFA), mobile identity management.

Olapic.description: Olapic is a content marketing tool specifically focused on visual marketing content.

Olark.description: Olark is a cloud-based live chat solution.

Omeka.description: Omeka is a free Content Management System (CMS) used by archives, historical societies, libraries, museums, and individual researchers for publishing digital collections.

Ometria.description: Ometria is a customer insight and marketing automation platform.

Omise.description: Omise is a payment gateway for Thailand, Japan and Singapore. Providing both online and offline payment solutions to merchants.

Omni CMS.description: Omni CMS (formerly OU Campus) is a web content management system developed by Modern Campus. Modern Campus is a SaaS-based student lifecycle management software designed to manage continuing education and non-degree programs.

Omniconvert.description: Omniconvert is an award-winning conversion rate optimisation (CRO) software that can be used for A/B testing, online surveys, traffic segmentation.

Omnisend.description: Omnisend is an ecommerce marketing automation platform that provides an omnichannel marketing strategy for businesses.

Omnisend Email Marketing & SMS.description: Omnisend Email Marketing & SMS is an omnichannel marketing automation channel that allows Shopify store owners to manage their SMS, web push notifications, WhatsApp, Facebook messenger, pop-ups, segmentation, and dynamic Facebook and Google ad integrations.

Omny Studio.description: Omny Studio is a podcast hosting solution, which enables radio stations and enterprises to manage, monetize, publish, share, edit and analyze audio episodes.

OnShop.description: OnShop is an ecommerce platform for online merchants.

OnUniverse.description: OnUniverse is the first website builder and commerce platform built for mobile devices.

One.com.description: One.com is a Denmark-based company offering bargain-priced WordPress and shared web hosting plans.

OneAll.description: OneAll is a social login solution enables your users to sign into their accounts on your website or mobile app using their login details from networking sites.

OnePage Express.description: OnePage Express is a beautiful WordPress theme that can be used to create a one page website in minutes by drag and drop.

OnePress Social Locker.description: Social Locker locks your most valuable site content behind a set of social buttons until the visitor likes, shares, +1s or tweets your page.

OneSignal.description: OneSignal is a customer engagement messaging solution.

OneTrust.description: OneTrust is a cloud-based data privacy management compliance platform.

Oney.description: Oney is an app that gives consumers back the power over their spending and makes split payments universal.

Onfido.description: Onfido is a technology company that helps businesses verify people's identities using a photo-based identity document, a selfie and artificial intelligence algorithms.

Ookla Speedtest Custom.description: Speedtest Custom is a robust and accurate testing solution that is HTML5-based, Flash-free and supports both mobile and desktop browsers built by Ookla.

Oopy.description: Oopy provides you with a simple and easy way to turn your Notion page into a performant website.

Open Graph.description: Open Graph is a protocol that is used to integrate any web page into the social graph.

Open Journal Systems.description: Open Journal Systems (OJS) is an open-source software application for managing and publishing scholarly journals.

Open-Xchange App Suite.description: Open-Xchange is a web-based communication, collaboration and office productivity software suite.

OpenCities.description: OpenCities is a content management system built for government organizations.

OpenElement.description: OpenElement is a free website building application with a WYSIWYG interface.

OpenGSE.description: OpenGSE is a test suite used for testing servlet compliance. It is deployed by using WAR files that are deployed on the server engine.

OpenLayers.description: OpenLayers is an open-source JavaScript library for displaying map data in web browser.

OpenPay.description: Openpay is an innovative online and in-store payment solution enabling you to purchase now and pay later, with no interest.

OpenResty.description: OpenResty is a web platform based on nginx which can run Lua scripts using its LuaJIT engine.

OpenSSL.description: OpenSSL is a software library for applications that secure communications over computer networks against eavesdropping or need to identify the party at the other end.

OpenStreetMap.description: OpenStreetMap is a free, editable map of the whole world that is being built by volunteers largely from scratch and released with an open-content license.

OpenTable.description: OpenTable is an online restaurant-reservation service company founded by Sid Gorham, Eric Moe and Chuck Templeton on 2 July 1998 and is based in San Francisco, California.

OpenWeb.description: OpenWeb is a social engagement platform that builds online communities around digital content.

OpenX.description: OpenX is a programmatic advertising technology company.

OpinionLab.description: OpinionLab is a omnichannel customer feedback solution provider.

OptiMonk.description: OptiMonk is an on-site message toolkit used to improve conversions using action-based popups ad bars.

Optimise.description: Optimise Media Group is a UK-based performance advertising network.

Optimizely.description: Optimizely is an experimentation platform that helps developers build and run A/B tests on websites.

Optimizely Commerce.description: Optimizely Commerce is a complete suite for digital ecommerce and content management that uses artificial intelligence to deliver personalised experiences, individualised search rankings and product recommendations.

Optimizely Content Management.description: Optimizely Content Management (formerly EPiServer) is digital content, ecommerce, and marketing management solution designed for editors and marketers.

Optimove.description: Optimove is a relationship marketing hub powered by a combination of advanced customer modeling, predictive micro-segmentation and campaign automation technologies.

OptinMonster.description: OptinMonster is a conversion optimisation tool that allows you to grow your email list.

OptinMonster plugin.description: OptinMonster is a lead-generation plugin for WordPress.

Oracle Application Express.description: Oracle Application Express (APEX) is an enterprise low-code development platform from Oracle Corporation. APEX is a fully supported no-cost feature of Oracle Database.

Oracle BlueKai.description: Oracle BlueKai is a cloud-based big data platform that enables companies to personalise online, offline, and mobile marketing campaigns.

Oracle Commerce.description: Oracle Commerce is a unified B2B and B2C ecommerce platform.

Oracle Commerce Cloud.description: Oracle Commerce Cloud is a cloud-native, fully featured, extensible SaaS ecommerce solution, delivered in the Oracle Cloud, supporting B2C and B2B models in a single platform.

Oracle Infinity.description: Oracle Infinity is a digital analytics platform for tracking, measuring, and optimizing the performance and visitor behavior of enterprise websites and mobile apps.

Oracle Maxymiser.description: Oracle Maxymiser is a real-time behavioral targeting, in-session personalisation, and product recommendations platform.

Oracle Web Cache.description: Oracle Web Cache is a browser and content management server, which improves the performance of web sites.

Orankl.description: Orankl is a provider email marketing and review services.

OrbitFox.description: OrbitFox is a multi-featured WordPress plugin that works with the Elementor, Beaver Builder and Gutenberg site-building utilities by Themeisle.

Orchard Core.description: Orchard Core is an open-source modular and multi-tenant application framework built with ASP.NET Core, and a content management system (CMS).

Orckestra.description: Orckestra is a provider of cloud-based digital unified and omnichannel commerce solutions for retail and manufacturing industries.

OrderLogic app.description: OrderLogic app allows you to define minimum and maximum product quantities for all products in your Shopify store.

OrderYOYO.description: OrderYOYO is an online ordering, payment, and marketing software solution provider.

Ordergroove.description: Ordergroove provides a SaaS (Software as a Service) based subscription and membership commerce platform.

Ordersify Product Alerts.description: Ordersify Product Alerts is a Shopify app which detects automatically product stock and send email alerts to contact immediately after your products are restocked.

Osano.description: Osano is a data privacy platform that helps your website become compliant with laws such as GDPR and CCPA.

Osterreichische Post.description: Österreichische Post is an Austrian logistics and postal services provider.

OutSystems.description: OutSystems is a low-code platform which provides tools for companies to develop, deploy and manage omnichannel enterprise applications.

OutTheBoxThemes Panoramic.description: Panoramic is a fully responsive WordPress theme with a homepage slider by OutTheBoxThemes.

Outbrain.description: Outbrain is a web advertising platform that displays boxes of links, known as chumboxes, to pages within websites.

Outlook Web App.description: Outlook on the web is an information manager web app. It includes a web-based email client, a calendar tool, a contact manager, and a task manager.

Oxatis.description: Oxatis is a cloud-based ecommerce solution which enables users to create and manage their own online store websites.

Oxi Social Login.description: Oxi Social Login provides one click login with services like Facebook, Google and many more.

Oxygen.description: Oxygen Builder is a tool to build a WordPress website.

ocStore.description: ocStore is an online store based on Opencart and open-source.

onpublix.description: onpublix is a web content management system (CMS) platform for eBusinesses.

osCommerce.description: OsCommerce is an open-source ecommerce and online store-management software program​.
